title: Tokyo Olympics to Bar Spectators From Overseas to Stem Covid-19 Risk
content:
1. Tokyo Olympics to Bar Spectators From Overseas to Stem Covid-19 Risk  The Wall Street Journal

  4. International spectators will be refused entry into Japan for Tokyo 2020  CNN International

localize.title: 东京奥运会将禁止海外观众入场，以杜绝Covid-19风险。
東京奧運會將禁止海外觀衆入場，以杜絕Covid-19風險。
